content.summary: Full Stack Engineer with expertise in C++, DSA (Data Structures and Algorithms), Web and Mobile Application Development, MERN Stack, Flutter. Holds certifications in Azure and Cyber Security. Demonstrated strong analytical skills, leadership abilities, self-learning initiatives, and clear communication.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
responsibilities: Developed and launched 50+ Web and Android apps for portfolios, businesses, and education.
Led the redesign of Newsadda.in, the company's news platform.
Supervised key AWS services such as EC2, Beanstalk, S3, and RDS to facilitate Web hosting.

experience.title: Technology Consultant
responsibilities: Conducted client discovery and designed business cases.
Defined project approaches, conducted market scans, and presented solutions to address client challenges.

projects.name: WebSurfer
projects.objectives: Develop a web browser named WebSurfer under MeitY’s Atmnirbhar Bharat Hackathon.

projects.name: Recruitment Management System
projects.objectives: Built a Recruitment Management System allowing recruiters to create candidate profiles.

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: 8.5 CGPA in MCA,7.0 CGPA in BCA
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Freelance Web and Mobile Application Developer, Social Media Manager, Graphic Designer.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Led the redesign of Newsadda.in, designed business cases at Deloitte.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Conducted client discovery and presented solutions to address client challenges.
